game.name: Warriors League
game.description:
You are going to lead a band of brave warriors. Are you ready friends to go on this unique fighting adventure where your intense fighting abilities can get through all the hurdles? Join Warriors League and be prepared to travel across the area that is full of obstacles! A horde of evil dominion has invaded the kingdom and you have taken the responsibility of freeing your kingdom from these monsters. Do not bother as you are not alone to fight against these deadly enemies.

You have to put your eyes on the screen to control of three different heroes that include a magician, an archer or a knight. The best thing is that each hero is blessed with unique abilities, armor and weapons. Grab your weapons and get ready to travel through different dangerous lands and face off a wide range of deadly monsters and magical creatures that you see on your way! Feel free to use a special skill occasionally when you see building up your power bar!

Collect coins and use those coins to upgrade your heroes when you progress in the game! There are 18 unique and challenging levels to complete and an excellent variety of monsters to fight. Select your level and get ready to conquer this battle like a true action hero! This cool archery game includes various monster models and upgradeable heroes using earned coins. Switch control to another hero anytime you want!

game.webControlKeys: Z /OR L CLICK TO ATTACK,X/SPACE-SPECIAL, C/123- CHANGE THE HERO
